reviews_data.review_text: Coffee is delicious, servi e is great, if working in the building and want a treat opposed to office coffee it suits the need.

Came by to have breakfast and they weren't serving food because "it was too busy", and it really was not busy at all. This is very unexpected from a restaurant, seems like the workers were annoyed when I asked for a menu, and did not want to be there.
Such a great place to go if you want coffee or tea the best service ever
Nicely fitted out coffee shop, shame about the rudely disinterested staff member and overly burnt latte.
Unique coffee shop, nice place to hang

I've been coming here at least 3 times a week in the mornings while walking my dog for the past several months. My first visit, I waited outside with my dog for someone else to run in and grab my coffee. A staff member opened the door and told me dogs were allowed and to come in. Months later, I've never had an issue. Today the moment I walked in I'm told "dogs aren't allowed." I asked even if we were just ordering and the answer was no. I was just here 2 days ago with my dog and that was not an issue. I was refused service. We never sit and hang out, I always get my coffee while walking and then continue our walk. The staff member wasn't apologetic, empathetic, or anything else. Super disappointing.
Nicely offers pour over and aero press. With multiple beans to choose from.

Most all of the service is great at this location... coffee is great,  the ladies are plesant and will make what you like if you know what's used if they don't have that specific drink bc each water bean may have a little something different than the regular menu every now and again. We'll keep returning to this location

It's Me Stef!!!
bonified . Charlottean. Former  Uptown Hospitality /travel industry Concierre/ professional

I realize the recent reviews are good.. and as recent as three days to a month ago....
I'm confident in my unpopular opinion of this spot. 
Reviews don't come in too often .., so that falls under the category of ..,, if you can't  say something nice ....
Fill in the blank....
Let's go!!!!!!
Downtown Charlotte ... staying at the beautiful Kimpton Tryon Park....decided to try Waterbean Coffee instead of the local and always present Starbucks
A Monday morning  between 10:30-11:00 am.
Spent 11.00 for myself and my sister .

Here are the specifics :
If atmosphere is all you're after, this is a beautiful space to just sit and stare or open your laptop.
See the pics 
Touring, visiting, or investigating the downtown area , in search of any level of warmth, comfort or friendliness from staff???
Nope.

*THE HUMAN
still desires... warmth. A little bit. - me

My sister wasn't sure what to order. She just knew she wanted a coffee... a little sweet... a little strong....
It was obvious when ordering ... no guidance from staff....i was aware.
Just watched . Listened.
Oh! Also BARELY  an AUDIBLE GOOD MORNING
Three  staff members.ALL LOOKING DIRECTLY AT US.
Ok. I'm super low maintenance.... So- I don't need all that extra ness...just  a fresh cup of black coffee

Ok just don't  say anything .
Maybe that would have been better.

Coffee and kindness matched.

Clearly it was ( my coffee) whatever was left from the early morning .... Which is fine.... BUT. It also tasted like it . It was just a coffee- black.
Unfresh. Coffee and staff kindness matched. served with a bland , cold, "there you go..."  feeling and placement on the counter .

I was not pleased.
I drank it purely because ... caffeine

Dear Mr. Or Miss management: it is unacceptable in this hour of " Google reviews" for  staff to not make sure that a customer is ordering what they really want , as well as receive guidance in placing their order when it is perceived by staff that the customer may not be knowledgeable about how menu items are prepared .
Or.... Does staff have any idea how to anticipate or perceive customer needs?
And that's more than just showing what types of milk are offered..,,
There was no line, no wait..  but no warmth or friendliness...., just a level of " nicety".,,
BTW I DID SAY good morning loud enough for all three to hear.

My coffee was unfresh.
I waited to see if staff would be a little more informative in receiving my sister's order.... So that she gets her money's worth....isnt that important ?

Minimal information given  we do see now coconut milk is  not offered....ok... since the lady turned the little  sign around for us to " see"

Message: if you don't like people in the morning - don't work at a coffee spot

Message again:   with Starbucks just around the block, up the street  and  around the corner  , and then again around another corner ....my thought is ...this is just a coffee spot. No difference made. No Personality.

I'll go get a Venti for  $90.oo next time .

My sister and I sat there to drink our coffee
She didn't have what she expected . We made it work.

This was our first visit.

After we sat there and I did my photo log.., we noticed quite a lot of whispering ...

Then .....as we left, One of them smiled !
SMILED and  said have a nice day ..,,

My first thought: did she poison us?
Clearly ready for us to leave.

Why did that have to be the impression given?

It would have felt better upon arrival ... the smile.... The smile wouldn't have hurt upon our arrival.
We did notice that the two gentlemen who came In after received quite different greetings and service than we did....
Oh.... So that's a latte!!!

Just put a sign on the door that only welcomes ... " your regulars"

I'll spend 10.00 with the siren.

That's my review and thank you for reviewing it

Peep the pics

Let's Go Eat!!!
ItsMeStef
Great coffee and vegan muffin was excellent as well.
AMAZING GLUTEN FREE PASTRIES. Gf cinnamon muffin was the most delicious muffin i've ever had. They also had gf lemon loaf, gf breakfast cookie, gf chocolate chip muffin.
This is a great little coffee shop. Well made drinks in a great atmosphere, what more do you need in a coffee shop?
I love Waterbean as a chain. But, this location runs out of iced coffee on an almost daily basis. Very poor management at this shop.
Amazing baristas! Positive energy and creative speciality drinks.

Awesome coffee shop with delicious sandwiches right next to the Kimpton Tryon Hotel! Must go coffee shop if you're visiting the area. They also have a few dietary restriction options such as dairy free and vegan
We stopped in for coffee before a show the other evening. Great coffee and an excellent atmosphere!
Must visit place for everyone who loves coffee
Very cool, comfortable space to sit down and relax, do some work or chat, read or simply drink good coffee. Absolutely lovely.
Un buen cafe y a buen precio. El lugar es amplio y muy comodo hay mesas para trabajar,conectar tu computador o recargar tu celular . Excelente ubicacion en el Downtown de  Charlotte
First try, pretty good
Emily was so nice! She over delivered with our muffin<3

The atmosphere was nice. I went with a group of friends, we all ordered and they got their coffee, I stood waiting for like 20 minutes. They made a lot of other drinks while I waited on mine.  Then they made the wrong drink, but by then my friends were ready to go and I was tired of waiting. Awful service, they didn't seem to care at all.
Malea and Lindsey are literally the greatest baristas of all time. I'll drive 10 miles out the way to buy a cappuccino from them specifically. World class.
One of the best Hot Chocolates I had recently. Loved the ambience too. Staff were very friendly and courteous. Would definitely try again whenever I'm in town

I want there to experience the customer service or atmosphere but someone has given me an iced cold brewed coffee while trying to get money for food for me and my service dog rogue.

It's the best iced coffee I had.

The atmosphere and the choice of different coffees in this cafe is really nice. But unfortunately the price value wasn't too good. The cake we got was completely covered with sugar which was way too sweet and also the coffee was super sweet. One point that made me very upset is that we mentioned we'd like to sit down there to drink our coffee and they still gave us To-go cups which is to me a big lack of environmental awareness.
Super coffee! I had a couple of excellent 8oz Flat Whites during my stay.
The chai latte was DELISH.

Water bean downtown location.
Nice and clean!
Good coffees
Choose this coffee house next time! Best bacon,egg, cheese croissant I have ever had, great coffee, friendly servers. Worth the walk from wherever you are.
Cute little coffee shop. Friendly staff and great coffee.

Local business with specialty coffees for the season. The space is really nice and a great spot to work remotely or enjoy a quiet afternoon. Plenty of coffee options and what was most interesting was a coffee flight that they offered. I will need to try that next time.

Ice cream is also sold here.

Waterbean! Waterbean Coffee has bean a great experience this morning. The coffee was grounds for a 5 star alone. Our group got the Paradise Latte and Snickerdoodle Latte. The food was awesome and I'm surprised I haven't heard more about it. We had the East and West sandwich with egg added to make it more breakfast-like. We also got bacon egg and cheese sandwiches on bagels with their Waterbean breakfast sauce which is spectacular. Their location in South End is really nice inside and out as well. Great place to meet for coffee/food before work. Overall I give it a 9.1/10
All inclusive atmosphere

Excellent espresso. They offer a choice of four different beans and blends just for the shot of espresso! The folks are friendly. The service is quick. Good variety of seating choices: long table with stools, couch and leather chairs, stools and high tables.

Overall, this place is great.

Nothing to eat except for muffins n chips  n coffee  was burnt taste n McDonald's coffee  is better.n served a dine in coffee n muffin in a togo cup n bag .had to ask for  like that .n 8n the city  of Charlotte n costed 8.73.
Disappointingly watered out tasting tea and coffee.
Cool coffee place that you can also grab a can of beer. Good place to have a discussion.
Had a ice coffee and a smoke salmon bagel with cream cheese delicious

Overall probably wouldn't personally choose to come back. Just overall dim atmosphere that wasn't picked up or wiped down. Hard to find outlets, trash, bathrooms, etc. The coffee was good, but the baristas were sitting down when I arrived and it was a bit awkward. They were really kind and nice though!
Great fast breakfast option and coffee! Asked for an alternative to the sausage on the croissant and they were ver accommodating!
Great coffee, fast and friendly staff!
Pretty cozy and well decorated with lots of outlets if you want to spend some hours with you laptop. The location is also adds to the vibe. They have multiple couches which is a plus.
Worked from this shop everyday for a week,  when in town.  Cozy shop with good coffee and good food.
Super coffe

I loved the coffee and the customer service! Beautiful people with beautiful smiles, but I knocked off a couple of stars because of the stools around the wooden tables? Since they were the only tables with charging ports, I had to sit there. But after I got up, I had the WORST backache. Honestly, made me reconsider coming back. If those stools were switched out for some comfy chairs, this place would have allll my money and study sessions.
Picked up my girl here and I danced to the music. They also have clean bathrooms. Bonus.
BEST COFFEE EVER !!!
The Milano cookie latte was superb. Loved the macaroons as well.

Goddam! Flavor extraction accomplished. They do justice to the life of the bean that was sacrificed in the roasting process.

The baristas were not knowledgeable about the exact makeup of the water that was sourced for the brew, but otherwise they were quite friendly and knowledgeable.

I would recommend this establishment to any bean heads passing through.

I did not sample a pour over as they seem to be quite busy for the amount of staff available.
Very friendly staff and great coffee! The atmosphere presents as a small coffee house, clean and inviting with plenty of seating to work or sit down!
My favorite coffee shop uptown!
Like everything about it except the restrooms. In need of a good cleaning.
This is a great coffee shop!  So many drink selections and good atmosphere!!
Nice spot with plenty of places to sit down and work. Latte was pretty average and truthfully not that great. For almost $7, it's also one of the pricier coffee shops.
Good coffee.
Loved the creativity in the drinks! Had the "cup of snow" and was incredible. Employees were also nice.

Waterbean is beautiful.

It has its own brand with 11 coffee shops across North Carolina. This is the second one I have visited, but they both had a comfortable vibe.

Outside of the coffee shop had a California feel to it with the structural design of the place. Inside was nicely dimmed but not dark, which made it perfectly relaxing.

When I walked in, I wasn't greeted, but the workers seemed annoyed that I had come. I ordered food and waited 20 minutes because they forgot. I was pretty upset.

After I reminded her about my food, she apologized, made it, and her attitude was fantastic. She talked more, and I could tell she was sincerely sorry.

When I got my sandwich, it so so delicious. It was one of the best sandwiches I've ever had.

I'm from Cleveland, so I can't visit as much as I want, but I'll be looking forward to revisiting when I'm in Charlotte.

If this review was helpful, please leave a thumbs up.

Amazingly friendly staff. Great service and fast. Awesome selection of roasts for pour over. Some creative and tasty espresso drinks. Also a selection of tea drinks. They have a great selection of canned coffees and other drinks. A stop I'll always make when in town. Worth a stop when in downtown Charlotte.

I stepped out for a coffee break to the park and did not choose Starbucks. Very sad coffee and it wasn't even mixed well. I got chunks of powder in my mouth as I sipped. Totally disappointing.
I chose a flavour, but this beverage was sweeter than sugar.
Great place to study and relax!
Orange late is awesome!!!
Super friendly and very good coffee fast! Loved the plants and brightness of the coffee shop!
Great selection but service is very slow. Little disorganized.

Highly recommend this coffee joint! The refreshing atmosphere of this cafe keeps me coming back majority of my mornings in uptown, Charlotte. The natural lighting, scattered plants, and iced dirty chai lattes turn my remote work into something I look forward to instead of dread. The staff is here is super friendly and efficient at crafting their drinks in a timely manner. This is the one place in the city where I walk in and feel that time slows down and the "hustle culture" diminishes.
Loved  the coffee and Breakfast
Decent coffee, but tastes like a latte I could make at home. Tasted more like milk than a latte. Bagel was good! Only reason it's a 3 and not a 2.
Nice ambience, great service and staff , right next to  romane bearden park
The Creme Brule Coffee, omg
Super friendly barista and the paradise iced coffee was amazing!
Yummm strawberry crumble muffins. Gorgeous cold brew with choose your flavor cold foam? Yes please. Great vibe. Great baristas. Only regret is that I scarfed both items before taking a picture!
The atmosphere is very warm and inviting. I tried their paradise latte and the strawberry lemon muffin. Both items were very satisfying and delicious.
A bit pricey, limited menu but food is good
This space is super comfortable in addition to selling many varieties of coffee
I had a basic drip coffee and the wife had a vanilla latte. Both were good. Nice little area to sit outside as well.
Great coffee shop! Friendly staff, lovely store & amazing coffee! Certainly one of the best I've been to. I would suggest it to any coffee lover! It even has an amazing selection of tea!

I have never had a matcha milk tea taste so gross. It was grainy, smelled like fish, and overall just nasty. I also received it hot when I asked for it cold. I even added 4 packets of stevia but just ended up throwing it away. The place was nice and is a good spot to hang out but their drinks are not good. The people I was with ordered coffee and hot chocolate, they even said theirs wasn't good. I would try this place again if I am in the area and maybe order something else and be more specific about how I would like it.
Very good
Really good atmosphere and the coffee was great, would rather come here than Starbucks for the atmosphere alone
espresso and coffee flights

Reminiscent of the coffee houses of the 90's, Waterbean is a relaxing spot nestled in Uptown between Romare Bearden Park and what I call "the classier section of Tryon St." Comfy leather couches on rugs, long church pews, and stone countertops are just a few of the cool aesthetics. Great coffee and tea selections, a good sandwich menu , and fresh-baked goodies make it great place for pit stops or longer work stays. Note: The Dutch inversion method of cold brewing makes for a fun visual and a really smooth texture. Highly recommended!
Excelent experience.

Beautiful location and thanks so much for helping Officer Mia's Family with the money made on Christmas Eve 2021. It was my pleasure to be apart of something so special and have great coffee & bakery along the way!

Great atmosphere, nice spot to grab a coffee and hang out or work from downtown. I wish they had outlets more spread out throughout the space as they seem to be concentrated in only a few areas. But I've gone 2x to work and the wifi is strong and the drinks are tasty.
Best coffee
Staff is amazing

Wonderful service today! The barista was very sweet and very kind today. She was knowledgeable of the products that they served and provided the exact product I was looking for! This location is located in 300 S. Tryon and it's accessible from inside the high rise and has its own entrance off of Third Street!
Cute little coffee shop right downtown. We happened to walk by and decided to stop in the warm up. Delicious coffee and great vibes :)
Coffee was amazing. I picked up some loose leaf tea too that I am excited to try. I will definitely come back.

Super friendly barista! He was very polite and gave good suggestions. On top of that their card reader wasn't working when I tried to use a gift card, so my order was on him! I left my gift card with him so he could use it for himself or others. Would definitely go back there! Such great service. The iced mocha I got was delicious too!
Muy agradable el lugar, buen cafe y postres venganos (no es lo mio, pero tampoco me cae mal)
Place is closed when it says is open.
Coffee taste was amazing!
Kylie Thomas is the B E S T barista EVER!!! give her a raise asap! she knows my order by heart & makes the best coffees i've ever had not to mention shes the baddest b*tch working there

Friendly barista who welcomed me when I told her I'd never been and answered my questions with knowledge and ease :) my creme brulee iced coffee was one of the best drinks of my life; I'm picky about coffee, have tried many shops across the country and was VERY happy with it. So unique and not too sweet! Thank you Waterbean
Barista was very helpful and kind! I loved the drink she recommended. It was so smooth!
Good coffee and food at a reasonable price

I just walked in and ordered their vanilla bean macaroons. They are absolutely AMAZING. The flavor quite literally BURSTS in your mouth. I would absolutely recommend this macaroon set in particular. A set of 5 macaroons comes to $12.50 or $12.99, which some may find a little pricey. Personally, I believe the taste is worth it.

This location has a wide selection of teas and coffees, and are happy to accommodate for any customer with a food allergy by substituting ingredients, and is set in a very convenient location. I would rate this location 9/10 stars if I could. Great experience!
Love this place! Great location and atmosphere
